entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 40
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY AND BREEZY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE UPPER 30S IN THE AFTERNOON
WEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
LOWS AROUND 15

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
